title: ‘Historic’ step as Trudeau appoints Canada’s first Indigenous governor general
content:
1. ‘Historic’ step as Trudeau appoints Canada’s first Indigenous governor general  The Guardian
  2. Mary Simon, advocate for Inuit rights, named Canada’s first Indigenous governor general  The Washington Post
  3. Mary Simon is now the first Indigenous person to be named Governor General of Canada | APTN News  APTN News
  4. Canada's first Indigenous GG calls appointment 'step forward' to reconciliation  MSN Canada
  5. Inuk leader Mary Simon named Canada's 1st Indigenous governor general  CBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
‘Historic’ step as Trudeau appoints Canada’s first Indigenous governor general  The Guardian
Mary Simon, advocate for Inuit rights, named Canada’s first Indigenous governor general  The Washington Post
Mary Simon is now the first Indigenous person to be named Governor General of Canada | APTN News  APTN News
Canada's first Indigenous GG calls appointment 'step forward' to reconciliation  MSN Canada
Inuk leader Mary Simon named Canada's 1st Indigenous governor general  CBC News

localize.title: 歴史的な一歩、トルドー首相がカナダ初の先住民族総督を任命
特鲁多任命加拿大首位土著总督，这是 "历史性 "的一步
特魯多任命加拿大首位土著總督，這是 "歷史性 "的一步
